bibl.title: with contributions by several authors, The Roman Imperial Quarries. Survey and Excavations at Mons Porphyrites, 1994-1998. Volume 2: The Excavations. (Excavations Memoirs. 82.)
bibl.note: 1 front., nombr. tabl., profils, figg, cartes, plans, pll.

Vol. 1: London, 2001. - Report on the Egypt Exploration Society's excavations conducted between 1996 and 1998. - Pp. 397-411, tabl., figg.: Wilfried VAN RENGEN, The Written Evidence: Inscriptions and Ostraca. Presentation of some of the more significant ostraca (the full publication will follow in a separate volume), inscriptions from the site in I. Pan, not in I. Pan., and 3 new items.

PEACOCK David and Valerie MAXFIELD, with contributions by several authors, The Roman Imperial Quarries. Survey and Excavations at Mons Porphyrites, 1994-1998. Volume 2: The Excavations. (Excavations Memoirs. 82.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2007, 4°, xiii-449 pp., 1 front., nombr. tabl., profils, figg, cartes, plans, pll. ISBN 978-0-85698-180-7. £65.
